page.title: 04MAIN BUILDINGS IN L'MOUTH.
page.content: In the main part of the town,there are 14 food shops,16 non-food shops, 2 hotels,5 clubs,2 Church of Scotland churches,1 Baptist church,1 United Free church and 1 Gospel Hall.The main Post-Office is situated in this area and is opposite the Town Library and the Town Hall.There are 4 banks and St. Gerardine Primary School.The Police and Fire-Stations are both on Clifton Road,as are 2 restaurants, called La Caverna and the 1629, (that being the date found on one of the stones during restoration work.)There is also a group medical practice and a dentist in the area. There are both Local Authority and Private houses,as well as Ministry of Defence Married Quarters for the use of R.A.F. personnel.
